content: this pattern is for a dog shaped poop bag holder that can be made in a variety of colors fluffy yarn is best for the body you will need a small button for the draw string at the top this pattern was designed for standard size bag rolls and you will need to adjust accordingly if you are using different size rolls this is great for using up yarn scraps because it doesn t take much yarn and works up quickly if you downloaded this in the first few hours it s missing a row the pdf is now fixed but if you have the older version it should contain 14-16 single_crochet in each stitch 20sc for each row
